name: Elephant Smash
description:
Guide the hungry mouse back and forth to collect the cheeses as they appear. Avoid bouncing elephants and floor spikes.

Warning: this is a hard game. Get beyond level 4 and you're doing well!

Controls
Left & right : A/D or cursor keys
Jump : SPACE

Entry for the Hangover Game Jam 2019 written in a few hours
